values: 角色（戏剧、电影中的）；职责；职能；任务；功能；地位；作用；典型行为；身份；影响程度

word_group.brief_definition: 发挥作用；扮演角色；起到作用
主角；主导作用；领导作用
角色扮演；角色演习；参加角色扮演游戏
积极任务；积极作用；活跃角色

bilingual.source: Customs play a significant role in festivals.
bilingual.target: 习俗在节日中起着重要作用。

bilingual.source: Money plays an important role in our lives.
bilingual.target: 金钱在我们的生活中起重要作用。

bilingual.source: The new People's Republic of China saw Dr Lin Qiaozhi playing a key role.
bilingual.target: 新中国看到林巧稚医生发挥了关键作用。

bilingual.source: When people watch the show, they usually play a role in deciding the winner.
bilingual.target: 当人们观看节目时，他们通常在决定获胜者方面起作用。

bilingual.source: Prevented from playing her role in Riley's emotional development, Sadness feels annoyed.
bilingual.target: 被阻止在莱莉的情感发展中发挥作用，悲伤感到恼火。

bilingual.source: In China, volunteers are also playing an increasingly important role in environmental protection, disability assistance and many other fields.
bilingual.target: 在中国，志愿者在环境保护、残疾人援助和许多其他领域也发挥着越来越重要的作用。

bilingual.source: He played a pivot role in the team.
bilingual.target: 他在团队中起到了枢纽作用。

bilingual.source: He plays a dominant role in the team.
bilingual.target: 他在团队中起着主导作用。

bilingual.source: The doctor explained the role of sperm.
bilingual.target: 医生解释了精子的作用。

bilingual.source: The army played a crucial role in the war.
bilingual.target: 陆军在战争中起了重要作用。

list.abstract: Role（英 [rəʊl]，美 [roʊl]），英语单词，作名词为角色；作用；任务。例句：It diminishes the role of reviewers.（它削弱了评论者的作用。） Role的近义词有workers，mission，part等。
Role是一款全新的Web3理念应用 。Web3的最大特点是数据可持有，即用户掌握数据所有权、使用权和收益权。可以在Role上传并认证各种数据，形成个人数据库；然后将数据按需求授权给不同的身份，用在不同的社交场景；给每个身份设置规则，如何被搜索到，能被哪些人搜索以及可以支付多少费用才能联系等等。

yingyinNormal.en: All right. Indiana Jones plays no role in the outcome of the story.
yingyinNormal.zh: 奉陪到底，故事结尾印第安纳琼斯毫无作用。

yingyinNormal.en: I do think we're at the dawn of a new space era and it's one where commercial companies play a stronger role.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我认为我们处在一个新太空时代的开端，这个时代商业公司将发挥更大的作用。

yingyinNormal.en: Music and arts have always played the key role in my life, in building relationships, replacing what once was ignorance, fear and hatred, with acceptance, friendship and even love.
yingyinNormal.zh: 音乐与艺术在我生活中，对与他人建立关系一直有很重要的作用，将曾经的无知，恐惧和憎恨变为接受，友谊，甚至是爱。

yingyinNormal.en: So you will not be auditioning for the role of Katy anymore? Against you? Me against you for the role of me?
yingyinNormal.zh: 那么……你不会继续为凯蒂的角色试镜了？和你争？我和你争扮演我的角色？

yingyinNormal.en: Yes, of course I will play the role! I am perfect for everything! Wait. Why did Maya borrow you if you already have the role?
yingyinNormal.zh: 是的，我当然会扮演这个角色！我适合扮演所有角色！等会儿。如果你已经得到这个角色了，玛雅为什么还要绑架你？

yingyinNormal.en: Let's get to the tutorial. Max, you and I are going to role-play.
yingyinNormal.zh: 来开始教学吧，麦克斯，你得跟我角色扮演一下。

yingyinNormal.en: Really? What was the occasion? Date night. We do a little role-playing.
yingyinNormal.zh: 真的吗？为什么穿呀？约会夜。我们玩了一点角色扮演。

yingyinNormal.en: Well, Mom, do you want me to set her free? No, Mama really wants this role.
yingyinNormal.zh: 那么，妈妈，你想让我们把她放了？不想，你妈非常想要这个角色。

yingyinNormal.en: We had heard talk of Fang Zhen, the Red Lotus, taking a role in your empire.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们听说方正和红莲教的事在宋朝掀起了不小波澜。

yingyinNormal.en: The anterior cingulate cortex, which processes surprise, also plays a big role.
yingyinNormal.zh: 脑中的用来处理意外的前扣带回，它也扮演了很重要的角色。

yingyinNormal.en: And as the nation's leading beverage company, we have played an important role.
yingyinNormal.zh: 身为美国首屈一指的饮料公司，我们扮演着重要的角色。
yingyinNormal.videoNameZh: 《可口可乐史上最诚实的广告》

yingyinNormal.en: What? You want me to drive? Yeah. It's time my boy had a proper role in the gang?
yingyinNormal.zh: 啊，什么？你让我开车？对。我儿子终于可以大显身手了。

yingyinNormal.en: All of us, citizens, leaders, the media have a responsibility and a role to play.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们所有的公民，领袖，媒体都有责任，并且需要扮演自己的角色。

yingyinNormal.en: This is something I long ago came to Peace with in my role as the beta male. Open.
yingyinNormal.zh: 很久以前，当我陷入爱河的时候我是可以打开的，快开。

yingyinNormal.en: I agree, Gil. You do? I do think it's time Steve step out of his current role, yes.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我同意，吉尔。你确定？我确实在想是时候让史蒂夫脱离他现有的角色了，是的

yingyinNormal.en: Where did the cell get the energy to do all this? That's the role of the mitochondria.
yingyinNormal.zh: 细胞在哪里找来能量去做这些事情？那是线粒体的功能。

yingyinNormal.en: I think he may need black male role models. Men who can show him who he might grow into.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我觉得他需要黑人男性榜样。让他知道长大后能成为什么样子的人。

yingyinNormal.en: I assume you're deep cover back in London but isn't this taking the role a little too far.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我以为你的职责是留守伦敦，现在你好像有点越界。

yingyinNormal.en: Riley, explain the role of uranium in nuclear fission. I don't know. Yeah, you're a threat.
yingyinNormal.zh: 莱丽，解释一下铀在核裂变时的角色。我不知道。就你这样还能威胁到我啊。

yingyinNormal.en: There is only one person in the world who could play this role! I know. Anastasia Boulangerie!
yingyinNormal.zh: 在这个世界上只有一个人能演好这个角色！我知道。安娜斯塔西娅·布朗热里！

exam_freq_info.chinese: 地位; 作用; 职责

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 发挥作用；扮演角色；起到作用

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: the function assumed or part played by a person or thing in a particular situation
sense_info_list.zh: 地位; 作用; 职责

examination_example.sentence: Research by the World Economic Forum finds that on average 42 per cent of the "core skills" within job <highlight>roles</highlight> will change.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 世界经济论坛的研究发现，z职业中平均有42%的“核心技能”会发生变化。

examination_example.sentence: This forces users to be more conscious of their <highlight>role</highlight> in passing along information.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这迫使用户更加留意自己在信息传递中扮演的角色。

examination_example.sentence: Giovanni Parmigiani says he expects the board to "play primarily an advisory <highlight>role</highlight>."
examination_example.sentence_trans: Giovanni Parmigiani表示，他预计董事会将“主要发挥咨询作用。”

sense_info_list.en: the actor's part in a play, movie, or others

examination_example.sentence: There has been a kind of revival or a rethinking about what guilt is and what <highlight>role</highlight> guilt can serve.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 应该重新思考什么是内疚和内疚可以扮演什么角色。

word_usage.usage:
role作名词，表示“作用；职责”时，其后常接“介词in/of/for +名词或动名词（doing的形式）”的结构，如：
the role of the teacher 教师的角色
a leading role in settling the dispute 在解决争端中起主导作用

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: the function assumed or part played by a person or thing in a particular situation

examination_example.sentence: If you were in a management or leadership position, when discussing your current <highlight>role</highlight>, never take all the credit for accomplishments or achievements.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 如果你处于管理或领导的位置，当讨论你目前的角色时，千万不要把所有的功劳或成就都归于自己。

examination_example.sentence: In reality, your <highlight>role</highlight> is whatever you make of it.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 事实上，你的角色是你自己创造的。

examination_example.sentence: The <highlight>role</highlight> of homework in classrooms is not a new debate.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 家庭作业在课堂上的作用并不是一个新的争论。

sense_info_list.en: the actor's part in a play, movie, or others

examination_example.sentence: An interviewer may well think, why would this <highlight>role</highlight> be any different for you?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 面试官很可能会想，为什么这个角色对你来说会有什么不同呢？

examination_example.sentence: In short, managers should be ongoing <highlight>role</highlight> models for the change.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 简而言之，管理者应该成为变革的榜样。

examination_example.sentence: Characters that did represent a minority culture usually had secondary <highlight>roles</highlight> in the books.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 代表少数民族文化的角色在书中通常都是次要角色。

word_usage.usage:
“…的作用/角色”用the role of表达，of后的名词前一般不加冠词a或an。“在...中扮演...的角色”用play a role in sth.。
示例：The role of the teacher in the classroom is essential.
教师在课堂上的作用是必不可少的。

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 发挥作用；扮演角色；起到作用

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: the function assumed or part played by a person or thing in a particular situation

examination_example.sentence: They conducted large-scale research on the <highlight>role</highlight> of sugar in people's health.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们对糖在人们健康中的作用进行了大规模研究。

examination_example.sentence: Word use played a critical <highlight>role</highlight> in developing that doubt.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 用词在发展这种怀疑方面发挥了关键作用。

examination_example.sentence: Such findings prompted the American Academy of Pediatrics to issue a policy statement on the "crucial <highlight>role</highlight> of recess in school. "
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这些发现促使美国儿科学会发布了一份关于“学校课间休息的关键作用”的政策声明。

sense_info_list.en: the actor's part in a play; movie; or others

examination_example.sentence: It's an enduring responsibility based on the socialized gender <highlight>role</highlight> of women.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这是一种基于女性社会化性别角色的永久性义务。

examination_example.sentence: And chances were, in the images, Asian Americans appeared in stereotypical <highlight>roles</highlight>, such as engineers.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在形象中，亚裔美国人很有可能出现在刻板的角色中，比如工程师。

examination_example.sentence: Imitating the lifestyles of heroes and <highlight>role</highlight> models.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 模仿男主角和榜样的生活方式。

word_usage.usage:
“…的作用/角色”用the role of表达，of后的名词前一般不加冠词a或an。“在...中扮演...的角色”用play a role in sth.。
示例：The role of the teacher in the classroom is essential.
教师在课堂上的作用是必不可少的。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: Nielsen always felt he should be doing comedy but his good looks and distinguished voice kept him busy in dramatic <highlight>roles</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 尼尔森一直觉得自己应该做喜剧，但帅气的外表和独具特色的声音让他忙于戏剧的角色。

examination_example.sentence: He focused on playing dramatic <highlight>roles</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他专注于扮演戏剧角色。

examination_example.sentence: It wasn't until 1980—32 years into his career—that he landed the <highlight>role</highlight> it would seem he was made for in Airplane!
examination_example.sentence_trans: 直到1980年，也就是他职业生涯的第32年，他才在《空前绝后满天飞》中获得了一个看起来很适合他的角色！

examination_example.sentence: They say it can play a big <highlight>role</highlight> in calming the brain enough to sleep.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们说，它可以起到很大的作用，让大脑平静下来，足以入睡。

examination_example.sentence: The phone boxes are becoming popular mainly because of their changed <highlight>roles</highlight> and functions.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 电话亭越来越受欢迎，主要是因为它们的角色和功能发生了变化。

examination_example.sentence: In rural areas, where ambulances can take a relatively long time to arrive, the phone boxes have taken on a lifesaving <highlight>role</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在农村地区，救护车可能需要相对较长的时间才能到达，电话亭起到了拯救生命的作用。

examination_example.sentence: David Bond: A <highlight>Role</highlight> Model for Children
examination_example.sentence_trans: 大卫·邦德：孩子们的榜样

examination_example.sentence: Do you consider the author as your <highlight>role</highlight> model?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 你认为作者是你的榜样吗？

examination_example.sentence: She is not just a <highlight>role</highlight> model, but someone I love.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 她不仅仅是一个榜样，更是我爱的人。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 发挥作用；扮演角色；起到作用
主角；主导作用；领导作用

sense_info_list.en: the function assumed or part played by a person or thing in a particular situation

examination_example.sentence: They played an important <highlight>role</highlight> in the process of inventing the plane.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们在飞机的发明过程中发挥了重要作用。

examination_example.sentence: The movable type printing plays an important <highlight>role</highlight> in Chinese culture.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 活字印刷在中国文化中占有重要地位。

examination_example.sentence: Family members play an important <highlight>role</highlight> in your life.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 家庭成员在你的生活中扮演着重要的角色。

examination_example.sentence: Everyone should try to be a good <highlight>role</highlight> model.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 每个人都应该努力成为一个好的榜样。

examination_example.sentence: You can still be a <highlight>role</highlight> model to your sisters and brothers, a younger  neighbor, or anyone.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 你仍然可以成为兄弟姐妹、年轻邻居或任何人的榜样。

examination_example.sentence: Being a <highlight>role</highlight> model is never in the job.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 成为榜样从来都不是工作。

sense_info_list.en: the actor's part in a play, movie, or others

examination_example.sentence: In my first extra <highlight>role</highlight>, I was one of a group of office workers.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在我的第一个额外角色中，我是一群上班族中的一员。

examination_example.sentence: She has played <highlight>roles</highlight> in theater, television and movies.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 她曾在戏剧、电视和电影中扮演角色。

examination_example.sentence: Students will have the chance to act out <highlight>roles</highlight> with other students.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 学生将有机会与其他学生一起表演角色。

word_usage.usage:
“…的作用/角色”用the role of表达，of后的名词前一般不加冠词a或an。“在...中扮演...的角色”用play a role in sth.。
示例：The role of the teacher in the classroom is essential.
教师在课堂上的作用是必不可少的。
